summary: This module contains unit tests that validate the rasterio format handling within the imod package. It includes helper utilities for creating temporary raster files, comparing raster contents, and exercising read/write operations with xarray DataArrays, covering ASCII raster handling, save/open functionality, and nodata datatype behavior.
business_intent: To ensure reliable and correct integration of rasterio I/O operations in the geospatial modeling workflow, guaranteeing that raster data can be accurately read, written, and managed across different formats and data types.
